intro: Caladenia audasii, commonly known as the bold spider-orchid, is an Australian native orchid belonging to the Orchidaceae family. It is characterized by its striking, spider-like flowers that are typically pink or purple in color. The plant produces a single, erect stem that bears several showy, hooded flowers. Caladenia audasii is found in various habitats across southeastern Australia, including heathlands and woodland areas. It thrives in well-drained soils and is often associated with sandy or gravelly substrates.
